articles.title: Winning numbers announced for estimated $700 million Powerball jackpot - CBS News
articles.description: The Powerball jackpot soared to an estimated $700 million, making it the eleventh-largest jackpot in Powerball game history.

articles.title: Cracker Barrel’s marketing fiasco shows investors are making woke a massive risk factor - New York Post
articles.description: If the Cracker Barrel market puke has anything to teach Wall Street, it’s that investors who are deciding where to put their money must add corporate “wokeness” to their menu of risks to ­digest.…

articles.title: Trump’s tech deals break with U.S. traditions of free enterprise - The Washington Post
articles.description: Trump’s announcement that the U.S. government will take a stake in Intel follows deals with Apple, Nvidia and AMD that also entangled corporations with the state.

articles.title: New York City gives self-driving taxi firm Waymo the green light on pilot program - Gothamist
articles.description: The company can’t pick up passengers, for now. Critics say the city is not ready for autonomous vehicles.

articles.title: US Inflation to Edge Up as Powell Shifts on Job Market: Eco Week - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: A key US inflation gauge probably ticked higher last month, underscoring the challenge Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell and his colleagues face in balancing rising prices and mounting risks in a fragile job market.

articles.title: Rich economies will need foreign workers to fuel growth, policymakers warn - Financial Times
articles.description: Central bankers say low birth rates in world’s largest economies pose threat to productivity and prices

articles.title: Trump announces pending furniture tariffs - upi.com
articles.description: The Trump administration is undertaking a 50-day investigation into the furniture market, with pending tariffs likely to revive the nation's furniture industry.

articles.title: BTC climbed to 1.7% of global money before Fed chair signaled rate cut - Cointelegraph
articles.description: Bitcoin continues to increase its share of global money as governments and central banks around the world continue to expand the total money supply.

articles.title: $7,500 EV Tax Credit Extended For Tesla, Other Automakers — Kind Of - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: The EV tax credit still expires Sept. 30, but the IRS just gave buyers a little more time.

articles.title: 'I could not believe my eyes': Expert expects Orsted to finish US project – but at what cost? - Recharge News
articles.description: “I have never seen anything like this in equity research across a wide variety of industries in 20 years,” says Jacob Pedersen of Sydbank after Revolution Wind’s stop order

articles.title: Should You Buy Nvidia Stock Before August 27? - Barchart.com
articles.description: While U.S.-China tensions continue, Nvidia remains the undisputed king of AI hardware.

articles.title: Credit Fuels the AI Boom — and Fears of a Bubble - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Credit investors are pouring billions of dollars into artificial intelligence investments, just as industry executives and analysts are raising questions about whether the new technology is inflating another bubble.

articles.title: Air Canada flight bound for Las Vegas diverted to Chicago due to disruptive passenger - CBS News
articles.description: The flight from Toronto, Canada, was heading to Las Vegas when the disruptive passenger caused the flight to be diverted to Chicago's O'Hare Airport.

articles.title: Fed Chair Powell faces fresh challenges to Fed independence amid potential rate cuts - AP News
articles.description: Now that Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell has signaled that the central bank could soon cut its key interest rate, he faces a new challenge: how to do it without seeming to cave to the White House’s demands. For months, Powell has largely ignored President…

articles.title: What time is SpaceX's Starship Flight 10 launch on Aug. 24? - Space
articles.description: SpaceX aims to launch its Starship Flight 10 test mission no earlier than Sunday at 7:30 p.m. EDT (2330 GMT), if conditions allow.

articles.title: What Nvidia's China Confusion Means For Tech Giant And AI Nvidia Stock Yo-Yos On Worries About China, AI Bubble - Investor's Business Daily
articles.description: Nvidia stock has been bouncing around ahead of the company's earnings report, rattled by worries about China and an AI bubble.

articles.title: Businesses bringing back recession specials could be the latest sign of deteriorating consumer sentiment - CNBC
articles.description: The term "recession" has popped up again as a selling point this summer, perhaps providing a look at how businesses are reacting to consumer sentiment.

articles.title: Why utility bills are rapidly rising in some states - CBS News
articles.description: Residential electricity rates are expected to increase by as much as 18% in the next few years, according to the Energy Information Administration.

articles.title: A six-figure income by 35? Ideal ages for 6 money milestones. - USA Today
articles.description: Buy your first home at 30. Earn six figures by 35. Realistic or not, those are ages Americans ascribe to some of life’s financial milestones.
